titleStmt.title: Mr. Pepys to the President and Governours of Christ-Hospital upon the present state of the said hospital To the Honour'd Sir John Moor, Kt. and President, and the rest of my honour'd friends, the Governours of Christ-Hospital.
titleStmt.author: Pepys, Samuel, 1633-1703.
Moore, John, Sir, 1620-1702, recipient.
Parrey, William. aut
Christ's Hospital (London, England). Board of Governors, recipient.

notesStmt.note: A response is printed at foot of p. [2], signed: William Parrey.
Dated at head: York-Buildings. Monday, Novem. 21. 1698.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford.
